name: Ancient Apocalypse (sethtillery)
description: Ancient Apocalypse is a surivial rogue-lite game. Inspired from popular game "Vampire Survivor", Ancient Apocalypse lets player's battle demons and other monsters to surivive the day. Players can earn new weapons and upgrades by either leveling up or by spending your gold! Future updates may include more maps, game modes, weapons, upgrades and heroes. Test your luck in Ancient Apocalpyse!
